# 未来社区数字化操作系统白皮书

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/weilai-shequ-shuzihua-caozuoxitong-baipishu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/weilai-shequ-shuzihua-caozuoxitong-baipishu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install weilai-shequ-shuzihua-caozuoxitong-baipishu
weilai-shequ-shuzihua-caozuoxitong-baipishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g weilai-shequ-shuzihua-caozuoxitong-baipishu
weilai-shequ-shuzihua-caozuoxitong-baipishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
